column2: hen considering the above-mentioned evidence as a whole, the conviction

column1: was  based  on  sufficient  evidence.  The  allegation  that  the  Learned  High
Court  Judge  accepted  the  evidence  without  evaluating  it  judicially  has  no
merit; thus, I reject that argument.

column3: judgment,  we  do  not  see  sufficient

column1: grounds  to  interfere  with  the  judgment  of  the  Learned  High  Court  Judge
dated 21.05.2019. Therefore, the appeal of the appellant is dismissed.

column2: owever, considering the time the appellant has been in custody up to date,
